--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                             Lacuna REST PKI Client
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Overview
--------

This package contains classes to consume the REST PKI API. For documentation,
please visit:

	https://bitbucket.org/Lacunas/restpkisamples

Dependencies
------------

NOTE: In order to maximise compatibility, this package depends on an older
versions of the necessary packages. However, we recommend that you install
the latest version of the dependencies.
